dialogue.prompt: You arrive outside the Church. It is very empty… The doors are broken and must not have been opened in decades. If you had some tool, you might be able to fix them…

options.desc: Use the hammer to fix the doors
options.narrSays: You use the hammer to fix the Church doors. You can now go inside.
You decide to go back home

dialogue.prompt: You are now inside the church. There is nothing for you to do here. Where would you like to go?

options.narrSays: You decide to go back home
